DescribeProducts.document: This interface (DescribeProducts) is used for querying product information in each supported region list.
DescribeProducts.name: Query products that support region list queries

DescribeRegions.document: This interface (DescribeRegions) is used for querying the supported regions of each product.
DescribeRegions.name: Query the list of regions supported by the product

DescribeZones.document: This interface (DescribeZones) is used for querying product availability zone information.
DescribeZones.name: Query the product AZ list

members.document: Number of returned results, defaults to 20, maximum value is 100.
members.name: Limit

members.document: Offset. default value: 0.
members.name: Offset

members.document: Product detailed information list.
members.name: Products

members.document: Total number of products.
members.name: TotalCount

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Name of the product to be queried, such as cvm. for specific value, query the DescribeProducts api.
members.name: Product

members.document: Not passed or 0 means no query [optional business allowlist], 1 means query [optional business allowlist]. if this parameter is set to 1, the allowlist will only be queried when no business allowlist is found.
members.name: Scene

members.document: Number of Regions
members.name: TotalCount

members.document: List Information of Region
members.name: RegionSet

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Name of the product to be queried, such as cvm. for specific value, query the DescribeProducts api.
members.name: Product

members.document: No input or 0 means no query [optional business allowlist], 1 means query [optional business allowlist]. if this parameter is set to 1, the allowlist will only be queried when no result is found in the business allowlist.
members.name: Scene

members.document: Number of availability zones.
members.name: TotalCount

members.document: Availability zone list information.
members.name: ZoneSet

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Region name, such as ap-guangzhou.
members.name: Region

members.document: Region description, for example, South China (Guangzhou).
members.name: RegionName

members.document: Whether the region is in an available state.
members.name: RegionState

members.document:
Console type. defaults to null when called via api.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RegionTypeMC

members.document:
Region for different languages.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: LocationMC

members.document:
Region description on console display.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RegionNameMC

members.document:
1
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RegionIdMC

members.document: Product name, for example cvm.
members.name: Name

members.document:
Availability zone name, for example, ap-guangzhou-3. The names of availability zones across the network are as follows:.
  • ap-chongqing-1
  • ap-seoul-1
  • ap-seoul-2
  • ap-chengdu-1
  • ap-chengdu-2
  • ap-hongkong-1
  • ap-hongkong-2
  • ap-shenzhen-fsi-1
  • ap-shenzhen-fsi-2
  • ap-shenzhen-fsi-3
  • ap-guangzhou-1 (sold-out)
    • .
  • ap-guangzhou-2 (resource out of stock)
    • .
  • ap-guangzhou-3
  • ap-guangzhou-4
  • ap-guangzhou-6

  • ap-nanjing-2
members.name: Zone

members.document: Availability zone description, such as Guangzhou Zone 3.
members.name: ZoneName

members.document: AZ ID
members.name: ZoneId

members.document: Availability zone status, including AVAILABLE and UNAVAILABLE. AVAILABLE indicates available, and UNAVAILABLE indicates unavailable.
members.name: ZoneState

members.document:
Parent zone.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ParentZone

members.document:
Parent availability zone ID.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ParentZoneId

members.document:
Describes the parent availability zone.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ParentZoneName

members.document:
zone type.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ZoneType

members.document:
Console type.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: MachineRoomTypeMC

members.document:
Same as ZoneId. suitable for console invocation.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: ZoneIdMC
